intro: Stunning, realistic graphics realized with next-generation technology! Become a member of the world's most elite special forces in this modern warfare FPS game!
description:
The most dangerous operation, the deepest shadow. You are both shield and sword.
<Combat Forces> is an FPS game where you become a member of the world's most elite special forces and confront advanced threats threatening the world.

Players become elite agents of the team and are deployed on high-intensity missions to track down "Atlas," the leader of a multinational criminal organization.

・Top-notch, realistic graphics and presentation deliver an overwhelming sense of immersion.
・As part of a living, breathing elite team, execute operations alongside unique, elite members from the Assault, Engineer, Support, and Recon classes.
・Provides a variety of cooperative and competitive modes, including Deathmatch, Conquest, and Rush, offering an immersive single-team experience.
・Experience real-time teamwork with your teammates to complete missions. Missions unfold in isolated fortresses and high-stakes conflict zones in the Middle East. Each environment presents unique tactical challenges.
・Feel the vivid sensations of battle at your fingertips, including the vibrations of the latest weapons, the sound of their actions, and the changes in footsteps based on terrain.
・Control your main battle tank to strike enemy strongholds or provide cover for friendly infantry.

<Combat Forces> is a story of camaraderie, sacrifice, and the fierce struggle of special agents to protect the world from threats.
Join the ultimate special forces team. The world is at your fingertips.

Synopsis
On the surface, the world is peaceful, but behind the scenes, a mysterious transnational criminal organization operates across borders, sowing chaos. At the center of this chaos lies a shadowy leader, Atlas. More than just a terrorist, Atlas seeks to acquire advanced weapons capable of disrupting the global financial, political, and military systems. Your unit is the last line of defense, deployed to quietly eliminate this threat.

The team stumbles upon the first traces of Atlas in a Middle Eastern fortress. While the operation is successful, clues left behind by Atlas suggest they are more than just a criminal organization. The team faces the most meticulously designed defense systems, Atlas' elite forces, and unexpected enemies. In this hidden final confrontation, your sacrifice and determination will determine the fate of humanity.

Join the battlefield now and join your teammates who will protect your back!
